entryPhrase: CRYTOROLL - the first TON-based game merging NFTs with luck and patience
lowerFeesParagraph: Our decentralized peer-to-peer (P2P) platform significantly reduces fees compared to traditional systems. By eliminating intermediaries, we lower the cost for players, allowing them to enjoy more of their winnings. This P2P approach not only reduces fees but also increases fairness.
nftsHeader: Adding a New Dimension to DApp gaming
nftsParagraph: NFTs will enhance gaming experience by providing lower fees, visual appeal and additional functionalities. Players can use NFTs to unlock special features, access exclusive games, and receive bonuses. These NFTs will not only serve as digital collectibles but also as valuable assets that enhance the overall gaming experience.
fairAndTransparentHeader: A Fair and Transparent Gaming Ecosystem
fairAndTransparentParagraph: Our mission is clear: to build the best Web3 gaming platform, leveraging the TON blockchain's capabilities. Such traditional systems has long been marred by issues of centralization, high fees, and a lack of transparency. These problems erode trust and fairness, leading to an unsatisfactory experience for many players. Our platform aims to change that narrative.
leveragingParagraph: We chose the TON blockchain for its remarkable attributes: speed, security, and scalability. These features are essential for providing a seamless experience. The TON blockchain ensures that transactions are processed swiftly and securely, handling a high volume of transactions without compromising performance. This reliability is crucial for maintaining player confidence and ensuring smooth gameplay.
launchNftText: Release our first set of NFTs, which will be used to enhance gaming experience and provide staking rewards.
launchAppText: Develop and launch our decentralized application on the TON blockchain.
launchStakingText: Introduce a staking program where users can earn new tokens and NFTs, encouraging engagement and investment in the platform.
launchTokenText: Release our platform's native token, which will be used for transactions, staking, and governance.
tokenListingText: List our token on major cryptocurrency exchanges to ensure liquidity and accessibility for all users.
anyQuestionsParagraph: Here are the answers to the most frequently asked questions.
question1: Why is our app so special?
question1Answer: Our app stands out because we create a fair and transparent experience built on the TON blockchain. What makes our app even more unique is our focus on peer-to-peer (P2P) games. This approach allows players to directly engage with one another, making the experience more interactive and exciting. Additionally, we integrate NFTs into our platform, which adds a new layer of engagement and personalization. NFTs can represent exclusive assets, rewards, or enhancements, making each player's experience more dynamic and customized.
question2: Why should I buy the NFT?
question2Answer: Of course, you shouldn't, but having them would make a huge difference after the launch of the DApp. You could miss the opportunity to have the best and most rewarding experience with the app.
question3: Are there any drops or free tokens?
question3Answer: No! We are not a crypto-scam project. We aim to create a platform that will provide the best benefits of TON blockchain technology to our users. We may offer rewards for holding our NFTs in the future, but we are not just another click-and-earn project.
question4: How can i earn real money with this?
question4Answer: Now there is only one way, and that is to play the CryptoRoll app that will be released soon. Bet your money and try to beat your opponents to earn more. You can also enhance your experience and earn even more rewards by holding our NFTs.
question6: Is there a way to become a private member?
question6Answer: At the moment, there is no such opportunity. However, after the launch of the DApp, it is planned to create some spaces and communities for our NFT holders.

summaryText: Our mission is to create the ultimate Web3 gaming platform on the TON blockchain, featuring a unique blend of luck and patience. By leveraging the power of NFTs, we aim to transform the traditional gambling experience, offering unique benefits, rewards, and opportunities for players. Being a decentralized platform, the game is accessible to anyone with an internet connection and a TON wallet, ensuring a global player base without restrictions imposed by traditional systems.
introText: The gaming industry, where luck is the main aspect, has long been plagued by centralization, high fees, and a lack of transparency. We aim to address these issues by developing a decentralized, transparent, and fair platform on the TON blockchain. This platform will integrate NFTs to enhance the user experience and provide additional opportunities for rewards and staking.
feature1Text: Smart contracts ensure that no single entity controls the users’ money, leading to increased fairness, transparency, and trust. No 3rd parties like in traditional systems, only smart contracts, that provide you with 100% integrity, crypto movement and safety.
feature2Text: Utilizing the TON blockchain for its speed, security, and scalability, ensuring a seamless and efficient experience.
feature3Text: NFTs will be integral to our platform, providing unique experiences and benefits that traditional systems cannot offer.
feature4Text: NFTs will not only offer visual appeal but also bonuses and staking rewards, adding a new layer of value for users.
feature5Text: Users can stake tokens to earn more tokens and NFTs, which can be used in a future within the platform or traded for real products.
